string-array.name: signer_type_descriptions
string-array.item: Read data from API and Horizon
Manage not verified accounts and block/unblock general accounts
Create assets, create asset pairs and update policies
Create balances, spend assets from balances
Create and review invoice requests to other accounts
Create kyc requests with tasks and kyc requests for other users, manage kyc rule key value, review kyc requests create/update request
Create and review contract requests, manage contracts
Create and review atomic swap bid requests, create and review atomic swap requests, cancel atomic swap bids

resources.string: Have permanent access to the account
Can be revoked at any time
